body:
This seems to be the only use of .kind. It could be replaced with 

1. having `argspec.isTensor()`, or
2. `if(graph.inputs[i]->isSubtypeOf(DynamicType::get()))`
body_html:
This seems to be the only use of .kind. It could be replaced with

  1. having argspec.isTensor(), or
  2. if(graph.inputs[i]->isSubtypeOf(DynamicType::get()))
